Description: "For rent 1 bedroom $900 per month" Room for rent in Jamaica Plain Centre St. If you are looking to leave in Boston don't miss this chance. In this apartment there is a total of 4 bedrooms. Already have 3 tenants and looking for the 4th one to share this apartment. Lease will start Sep 1st, 2023 till August 31st, 2024 with chance of yearly renewal . Walking distance to all amenities, restaurants, convenient stores etc. (This is a 4 bedroom apartment. Tenant will need to share the apartment with 3 other person)
